attributes.action: Create a public vote to axe the COVID 19 rules or not!
attributes.additional_details: The reason is mental health is going through the roof. I have so many friends suffering with depression and losing work more than I know people with COVID-19 which is less than a handful. You are your own person and you should be allowed to make your own decision how you want to play your life.
attributes.background: Make it the publics decision if they want to follow the COVID 19 rules or not.
